inclusion.criterion: Completion of all components of the Phase 1 study (NCT00528801)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Wechsler Adult Intelligence Scale (WAIS) III-Performance IQ (PIQ) score less than or equal to 90
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Hemoglobin less than or equal to 9.0 g/dL
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: People who did not complete Phase I of the study are eligible for enrollment in this study if they meet all of the following criteria:
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Capable of giving informed consent for the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to undergo transfusion therapy for 6 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hemoglobin electrophoresis confirming hemoglobin SS or SB0 (less than or equal to 15%)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: WAIS III-PIQ score less than or equal to 90
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Hemoglobin less than or equal to 9.0 g/dL
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Mini-Mental Status Examination (MMSE) score of greater than or equal to 20
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Profile of Mood States (POMS) score on the Depression-Dejection Subscale less than or equal to 40
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of life threatening or serious transfusion complications
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Current enrollment in the Arginine study (NCT00513617)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of unexplained severe hemolytic transfusion reaction
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of serious allergic, pulmonary transfusion reaction requiring hospitalization
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Positive auto-immune hemolytic anemia (direct Coombs test with IgG and complement)
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: lab study: AST: 22 U/L, ALT: 43 U/L

notes: Patient has a history of sickle cell crises since childhood. He is currently experiencing severe bone pain.
